tooltips/error-scratchdb-deleted: The post has been deleted. (at least in ScratchDB)
tooltips/error-no-project: The project couldn't be found or is private.
tooltips/error-no-user: The user couldn't be found or is private.
tooltips/info-views: {count, plural, zero {No views} one {1 view} other {# views}}
tooltips/info-loves: {count, plural, zero {No loves} one {1 love} other {# loves}}
tooltips/info-favorites: {count, plural, zero {No favorites} one {1 favorite} other {# favorites}}
tooltips/info-remixes: {count, plural, zero {No remixes} one {1 remix} other {# remixes}}
tooltips/info-followers: {count, plural, zero {No followers} one {1 follower} other {# followers}}
tooltips/info-following: {count, plural, zero {No followers} one {1 follower} other {# followers}}
